Verses: 1 gnaanam Kooppidugiradhillaiyo? Buththi Saththamidugiradhillaiyo?
2 adhu Vazhiyarugeyulla Medaigalilum, Naarsandhigalilum Nirkiradhu.
3 adhu Oorvaasalgalin Oraththilum, Pattanaththin Mugappilum, Nadai Koodangalilum Nindru Saththamittu:
4 manushare, Ungalai Nokkik Kooppidugiren; En Saththam Manupuththirarukkuth Thonikkum.
5 pedhaigale Vivegam Adaiyungal; Moodargale, Buththiyulla Sindhaiyaayirungal.
6 kelungal, Mempaadaana Kaariyangalaip Pesuven; En Udhadugal Uththamakaariyangalai Vasanikkum.
7 en Vaai Saththiyaththai Vilambum, Aagaamiyam En Udhadugalukku Aruvaruppaanadhu.
8 en Vaayin Vaakkugalellaam Needhiyaanavaigal; Avaigalil Purattum Vibareedhamum Illai.
9 avaigalellaam Buththiyullavanukkuth Thelivum, Gnaanaththaip Petravargalukku Yadhaarththamumaayirukkum.
10 velliyaippaarkkilum En Buththimadhiyaiyum, Pasumponnaip Paarkkilum Gnaanaththaiyum Angeegariththukkollungal.
11 muththukkalaippaarkkilum Gnaaname Nalladhu; Ichchikkappadaththakkavaigalellaam Adharku Nigaralla.
12 gnaanamaagiya Naan Vivegaththode Vaasampanni, Nalyukthiyaana Arivugalaik Kandadaigiren.
13 theemaiyai Veruppadhe Karththarukku Bayappadum Bayam; Perumaiyaiyum, Agandhaiyaiyum, Theeya Vazhiyaiyum, Purattuvaayaiyum Naan Verukkiren.
14 aalosanaiyum Meygngnaanamum Ennudaiyavaigal; Naane Buththi, Vallamai Ennudaiyadhu.
15 ennaale Raajaakkal Arasaalugiraargal, Prabukkal Needhiseluththugiraargal.
16 ennaale Adhigaarigalum, Prabukkalum, Boomiyilulla Sagala Niyaayaadhipadhigalum Aalugaiseydhu Varugiraargal.
17 ennai Snegikkiravargalai Naan Snegikkiren; Adhikaalaiyil Ennaith Thedugiravargal Ennaik Kandadaivaargal.
18 aisuvariyamum, Ganamum, Nilaiyaana Porulum, Needhiyum Ennidaththil Undu.
19 ponnaiyum Thangaththaiyum Paarkkilum En Balan Nalladhu; Suththa Velliyaip Paarkkilum En Varumaanam Nalladhu.
20 ennai Snegikkiravargal Meypporulai Sudhandharikkumpadikkum, Avargaludaiya Kalanjiyangalai Naan Nirappumpadikkum,
21 avargalai Needhiyin Vazhiyilum, Nyaayapaadhaigalukkullum Nadaththugiren.
22 karththar Thamadhu Kiriyaigalukkumun Poorvamudhal Ennaith Thamadhu Vazhiyin Aadhiyaagak Kondirundhaar.
23 boomi Undaagumunnum, Aadhimudharkondum Anaadhiyaai Naan Abishegampannappatten.
24 aazhangalum, Jalam Puranduvarum Ootrugalum Undaagumunne Naan Janippikkappatten.
25 malaigal Nilaiperuvadharku Munnum, Kundrugal Undaavadharku Munnum,
26 avar Boomiyaiyum Adhin Veligalaiyum, Boomiyilulla Mannin Thiralgalaiyum Undaakkumunnum Naan Janippikkappatten.
27 avar Vaanangalaip Padaikkaiyil Naan Ange Irundhen; Avar Samuththira Vilaasaththai Vattanikkaiyilum,
28 uyaraththil Megangalai Sthaabiththu, Samuththiraththin Ootrugalai Adaiththu Vaikkaiyilum,
29 samuththira Jalam Than Karaiyai Vittu Meeraadhapadikku Adharku Ellaiyaik Kattalaiyittu, Boomiyin Asthibaarangalai Nilaippaduththugaiyilum,
30 naan Avar Aruge Sellap Pillaiyaayirundhen; Niththam Avarudaiya Manamagizhchchiyaayirundhu, Eppozhudhum Avar Samugaththil Kalikoorndhen.
31 avarudaiya Poovulagaththil Sandhoshappattu Manumakkaludane Magizhndhukondirundhen.
32 aadhalaal Pillaigale, Enakku Sevikodungal; En Vazhigalaik Kaaththu Nadakkiravargal Baakkiyavaangal.
33 neengal Buththiyaik Kettu, Gnaanamadaiyungal; Adhai Vittu Vilagaadhirungal.
34 en Vaasarpadiyil Niththam Vizhiththirundhu, En Kadhavu Nilaiyaruge Kaaththirundhu, Enakku Sevikodukkira Manushan Baakkiyavaan.
35 ennaik Kandadaigiravan Jeevanaik Kandadaigiraan; Karththaridaththil Dhayavaiyum Peruvaan.
36 enakku Virodhamaagap Paavanseygiravano, Than Aaththumaavai Sedhappaduththugiraan, Ennai Verukkiravargal Yaavarum Maranaththai Virumbugiravargal Endru Sollugiradhu.
